Citation Analysis as a Tool in Journal Evaluation .A Garfield, E. Journals can be ranked by frequency and impact of citations for science policy studies. .X 19	1	1301 37	2	1301 39	1	1301 40	2	1301 41	1	1301 47	2	1301 48	1	1301 88	1	1301 89	1	1301 97	1	1301 98	1	1301 100	1	1301 102	1	1301 103	1	1301 106	1	1301 107	1	1301 108	1	1301 111	1	1301 113	1	1301 233	1	1301 253	3	1301 313	1	1301 359	2	1301 377	2	1301 379	1	1301 395	1	1301 505	1	1301 560	1	1301 573	1	1301 602	1	1301 618	2	1301 622	1	1301 632	2	1301 635	1	1301 667	1	1301 677	1	1301 706	1	1301 729	1	1301 748	1	1301 749	1	1301 751	1	1301 764	2	1301 765	1	1301 777	2	1301 778	1	1301 782	1	1301 804	1	1301 805	1	1301 893	1	1301 952	1	1301 1016	1	1301 1061	1	1301 1062	1	1301 1083	1	1301 1085	2	1301 1086	1	1301 1087	2	1301 1182	1	1301 1200	1	1301 1270	1	1301 1273	1	1301 1274	2	1301 1275	1	1301 1277	1	1301 1278	2	1301 1280	2	1301 1285	1	1301 1287	2	1301 1291	2	1301 1296	1	1301 1301	10	1301 1302	4	1301 1304	3	1301 1313	2	1301 1337	2	1301 1338	2	1301 1344	2	1301 1347	1	1301 1380	2	1301 1428	1	1301 1444	3	1301 1444	3	1301
